name: Ideato.Ninja
body:
### Welcome 

[Ideato](https://www.ideato.com) provides innovative solutions and cost-effective products. We pioneer cutting-edge technologies to implement ideas, projects and strategies.

We support ambitious startups and companies to achieve their goals. We strive to help our partners grow and solve scalability issues.

We train driven professionals sharing our technical and methodological expertise. We hold training courses, conferences and events.

### Our side projects

You will find some links to our latest side projects on github. Feel free to use and/or contribute them!

* [idephix](https://github.com/ideatosrl/Idephix) is a PHP tool for building automated scripts
* [Vagrun](https://github.com/ideatosrl/vagrun) is a command-line tool that helps you to start and configure a PHP Vagrant machine from scratch
* [Vagrant-PHP-Template](https://github.com/ideatosrl/vagrant-php-template) Vagrant and Ansible configuration to build a lamp stack on ubuntu 14.04 trusty64 or 12.04 precise64.
* [FrontSize](https://github.com/ideatosrl/frontsize-sass) It's a CSS generator written to make websites easy to read on every device and faster to be coded. It gives to the developer a solid base which can be used to build responsive layouts for websites or web apps. 
* [Slack<3Spotify](https://github.com/ideatosrl/slack-spotify) a simple Slack-Spotify integration

### Contact
Do you want to learn more about us? Check out our [website](https://www.ideato.com) or [hire us](http://www.ideato.com/hire-us).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
